channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The people who have lost their jobs for posts about Charlie Kirk
item.description: As the Trump administration pushes for legal consequences for those who criticize Charlie Kirk or minimize his death, employers are likewise handing d...

item.title: Alex Pfeiffer leaves White House for Watchtower Strategy
item.description: Alex Pfeiffer — the White House's principal deputy communications director, and a key voice in the West Wing — is joining Watchtower Strategy, a risin...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: GOP future foretold
item.description: What does a post-Trump Republican Party look like? The past week has given us a clear glimpse of the most likely trajectory, based on conversations wi...

item.title: Photos: Activists beam Trump, Epstein images onto U.K. castle during president's visit
item.description: British police arrested four people after images of President Trump with sex offender Jeffrey Epstein were projected onto Windsor Castle on Tuesday ni...

item.title: It's "go time" for Anduril after defense-tech hat trick
item.description: Anduril Industries is on a hot streak. Why it matters: The neo-prime is biting off bigger and bigger chunks of the defense-contracting pie. In 2019, i...

item.title: The GOP cut parts of Obamacare. Now it’s at the center of a funding fight.
item.description: Democrats are asking for restored health care subsidies and funding in exchange for their support, but Republicans are daring them to risk a shutdown ...

item.title: Tim Walz launches bid for reelection as Minnesota governor amid 2028 speculation
item.description: The Democratic governor is far better known nationally after serving as his party’s 2024 vice-presidential candidate.

item.title: U.S. wins release of American who had been barred from leaving China
item.description: Beijing has allowed Mao Chenyue, a Wells Fargo employee from Atlanta, to return to the United States, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: Anti-Trump influencers flood the White House’s new TikTok account
item.description: The rocky rollout of the president’s official presence on the social platform showcases the challenges he faces among younger people online.

item.title: Obama condemns ‘horrific’ Kirk shooting, urges country to unite
item.description: Former president Barack Obama called the killing of Kirk a tragedy, and said the Trump administration was wrong to try and sow division after the shoo...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
